description: Option A (Racers): 4–6 x 300m/100m (300m @ 5k pace, 100m @ mile pace, 90–120s recovery). Option B (Non-Racers): 8–10 x 300m/100m (300m @ 5k pace, 100m @ mile pace, 90–120s recovery).

Option A (Racers): 2–3 x 1k (First 1k slightly slower than 5k pace, remaining segments @ 5k pace, 2–3m recovery). Option B (Non-Racers): 3–5 x 1k (Start @ half-marathon pace, work down to 10k pace, 1–2m recovery).
Social group run (for those not running the Brighton Turkey Trot). Free and open to all.
